file_content.text: Is it done? Has the Tyrant's uprising been quelled?
The threat is ended. He is no more, and the explosives he set have been destroyed.
Well done. You have made the galaxy a safer place, and put my mind at ease. Now I can concentrate fully on my healing.
May the Force be with you, my friend.
[You activate the monitoring station terminal and set it to the Republic frequency.]
Come in, come in, priority one, priority.... Ah, finally, we have a presence in that sector. Well met, friend, I am Master Shohn-Lowt.
You've arrived just in time. I'm sure you have urgent business of your own, but will you hear me out?
Don't dawdle.
Don't dawdle.
I'll be as brief as I can be.
Guess so.
Doesn't bother me.
Your cavalier attitude seems out of touch with what's going on here. And with what's at stake.
A Sith Lord known as the Tyrant has broken free of his cell. Before his capture, he murdered thousands and had dreams of galactic conquest.
I sent him here decades ago, had the warden droids take him to the deepest section, but now he's trying to free other dangerous inmates and make his escape.
It must not happen.
I'd join you myself, but I was badly wounded when the Esh-kha flooded the area.
Isn't this your mission?
I'm badly wounded, can't proceed. Was making my way to the Tyrant's cell when the Esh-kha flooded in. Barely escaped with my life.
What are you asking of me?
Isn't it clear? Perhaps you cannot tell that I'm badly wounded. When the Esh-kha flooded the area, I barely escaped with my life.
The Tyrant is using Republic munitions to blast holes through the prison walls, trying to create an exit for himself.
He'll release hundreds of the galaxy's most dangerous criminals. I need you to destroy all the explosives he's setting up and stop him for good.
Sound thinking.
Sound thinking.
"For good," huh?
It is grave work we must sometimes do.
The galaxy will suffer unimaginably if the Tyrant orchestrates his freedom. I'll await word from you.
I suppose so.
I can't tell you how terribly the galaxy will suffer if this madman orchestrates his freedom.
I hope you find the time to avert this disaster. I'll await your word.
Not today. [Refuse quest]
If this madman is released, the galaxy will suffer in unimaginable ways.
Please relinquish the console--maybe someone with some guts will show up.
[This monitoring station appears to be deactivated.]
Certainly.
You're right.
